title: 2020-05-18 - Ransomware Gang Arrested for Spreading Locky to Hospitals
plain_text:
# Ransomware Gang Arrested for Spreading Locky to Hospitals

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)

## Discussion


-----

Four arrested? Where's the fifth one? Or was it just randomly that they named
themselves pentaguard? Maybe the fifth one is negotiating a contract with some
government instead of being prosecuted?
